channel.title: All my questions in one post!
channel.description:
1- What are coords for dwarf city 2-How do you make it so when players click open door it teles you somewhere ( for broken doors ) 3-How do i make a highscores display board that will show the people with the most kills? 4-how do i add the follow option? 5-how do i make a feature like ::backup so it saves users profiles 6-How do i make a feature like ::pass newpassword so users can change there password 7-how do i make it so that when you teleport, it used the ancient teleport style with purple blocks 8-how do i make a feature for admins like ::freeze playername and it stops a player from moving until the admin does ::unfreeze playername
10-how do i do a feature like ::mute playername and it mutes them for 1 hour 11-how do i make a portal require a certain combat lvl to enter 12-how do i make a feature like the mime maze, when players go through each door they get like 10k agility xp? 13-how do i make special attacks work 14-how do i make a feature like members, you can edit a player with member ship, and you have to have members to enter a portal.
15-how do i make it so tele spells dont require runes 16-how do i make it so you have to have a key to enter the heros guild? 17-how do i make it so you can enter a trap door and be teled somewhere? 18- how can i make it so a player cant trade? 19- is it possible to make a little chat box on a board? so players can leave messages.
any help or answers to questions is appreciated, who ever helps will get admin status on my server. thanks
please bump this

item.title: All my questions in one post!
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

Yes. But even if you dont want admin i still might even pay you cash via paypal.

Read full topic

item.title: All my questions in one post!
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

1- What are coords for dwarf city
2-How do you make it so when players click open door it teles you somewhere ( for broken doors )
3-How do i make a highscores display board that will show the people with the most kills?
4-how do i add the follow option?
5-how do i make a feature like ::backup so it saves users profiles
6-How do i make a feature like ::pass newpassword so users can change there password
7-how do i make it so that when you teleport, it used the ancient teleport style with purple blocks
8-how do i make a feature for admins like ::freeze playername and it stops a player from moving until the admin does ::unfreeze playername

10-how do i do a feature like ::mute playername and it mutes them for 1 hour
11-how do i make a portal require a certain combat lvl to enter
12-how do i make a feature like the mime maze, when players go through each door they get like 10k agility xp?
13-how do i make special attacks work
14-how do i make a feature like members, you can edit a player with member ship, and you have to have members to enter a portal.

15-how do i make it so tele spells dont require runes
16-how do i make it so you have to have a key to enter the heros guild?
17-how do i make it so you can enter a trap door and be teled somewhere?
18- how can i make it so a player cant trade?
19- is it possible to make a little chat box on a board? so players can leave messages.

any help or answers to questions is appreciated, who ever helps will get admin status on my server. thanks

please bump this

Read full topic
